name: daysInMonths
description: Returns an array of days in a particular months. Number of days in February varies if it is a leap year or not.
signature: (leapYear: boolean) => [number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number]
questions: How to find out how many days are in a particular month?
How to find out how many days there are in a leap year?
